description: Looking for a software developer? You are in the right place! Hi, Quoting Albert Einstein: ”Once you stop learning, you start dying”, and that is why I'm committed to staying current with the latest technologies and frameworks. It is my pride and joy to build responsive and scalable web applications. Self-initiative independency and teamwork are the recipe for creating seamless, high-performing and visually engaging user experiences. I'm looking forward to solving complex problems and continuously pushing boundaries possibly with you, and to turn innovative ideas into reality together.
